effect_entries.effect:
When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals an opposing Pokémon's held item to all participating trainers.

In a double battle, if one opponent has an item, this Pokémon will Frisk that Pokémon; if both have an item, it will Frisk one at random.
effect_entries.short_effect: Reveals an opponent's held item upon entering battle.

effect_entries.effect: This Pokémon deals twice as much damage with moves that are not very effective against the target.
effect_entries.short_effect: Doubles damage inflicted with not-very-effective moves.

effect_entries.effect: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage after each turn.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Speed one stage after each turn.
